issue.title: [Python][Compute] Add bindings for ProjectOptions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11166](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11166). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Similarly as ARROW-10725, need to expose `ProjectOptions`:

```Java

In [4]: from pyarrow.compute import project
/home/joris/scipy/repos/arrow/python/pyarrow/compute.py:137: RuntimeWarning: Python binding for ProjectOptions not exposed
  warnings.warn("Python binding for {} not exposed"
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11166?focusedCommentId=17260595) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
(it would be nice to have a test to detect this, to avoid it in the future. Maybe just a test that import pyarrow.compute doesn't generate a warning)

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11166?focusedCommentId=17262705) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9131
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9131>
